markdownRemark.html: Spanish language school. Offers different Spanish language courses and accommodation for students. The teachers are native Spanish speakers, qualified with university degrees and in addition to their many years of experience teaching students of all nationalities, the team is dynamic, friendly and incredibly motivated.
